price: Ẹ̀yin kò sì níí fẹ́ (kiní kan) àfi tí Allāhu bá fẹ́. Dájúdájú Allāhu ń jẹ́ Onímọ̀, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.¹
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
